product_name: Patagonia Hemp Overstone Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: Roll up the cuffs and spend the day climbing or cruise around downtown with the comfortable Patagonia Hemp Overstone pants. Hemp/polyester blend has the soft touch of hemp and the durability of polyester. Gusseted crotch and articulated knees increase mobility. 5-pocket-jean styling includes bar tack reinforcements on the pocketing. The Patagonia Hemp Overstone pants have a relaxed fit.
short_description: Roll up the cuffs and spend the day climbing or cruise around downtown with the comfortable Patagonia Hemp Overstone pants.
